heading: HB06340
0: AN ACT CREATING A COMPREHENSIVE POLICY ENABLING YOUTH PARTICIPATION IN ADOLESCENT PREGNANCY PREVENTION
status: Pending with the Committee on YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT since 2020-02-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06340
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING A COMPREHENSIVE POLICY ENABLING YOUTH PARTICIPATION IN ADOLESCENT PREGNANCY PREVENTION
ABSTRACT : "The Local Council Adolescent Act of 2020" Aims to address the alarming increase of teenage pregnancy incidence among Filipino women which has brought serious consequences for teenagers involved and has affected every aspect of their lives, both their physical and mental well-being, during and after the baby is born. Defines "Adolescent Pregnancy" as an individual belonging to the age group of 10-19 who is child-bearing; Seeks to create a comprehensive policy enabling youth participation in adolescent pregnancy prevention.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, SHAREE ANN T.
DATE FILED : 2020-02-19
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2020-11-12)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2020-03-09)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2020-02-24
